tree.original_reasoning:
We are given two programs to complete.

For program1.py:
The code is almost complete. We are missing the condition for Division 2.
According to the problem, Division 2 is for ratings between 1600 and 1899 (inclusive).
In the current code, we have:
  if num>=1900: ... (Division 1)
  elif num>=1600: ... (Division 2)
  elif num>=1400: ... (Division 3)
  else: ... (Division 4)

Note that the condition for Division 2 is satisfied when the rating is at least 1600 and less than 1900.

The problem is about infecting a tree in minimal seconds. The process in each second:
  1. Spreading: for each vertex v, if at least one child is infected, you can infect at most one additional child (if available and not infected) of your choice.
  2. Injection: you can choose any healthy vertex and infect it.
